title: Requires the taxi and limousine commission of the city of New York to develop procedures for requiring inspection stickers to be visible to the public
summary: Requires the taxi and limousine commission of the city of New York to develop procedures for requiring inspection stickers to be visible to the general public and indicate the date for the next subsequent inspection date.
